channel.title: Is it...?
channel.description: Yesterday a noob came up to me in my server and said, "Are you irlegal?" I didn't understand but quickly caught on to what he was saying, so i remembered when i played WoW private servers, the host was being sued by Blizzard. So can we [or mopar] get sued for this? [BTW]: I know it's a stup1d topic, and there's no "1nt3rn3t p0l1c3" but post your comments here.

item.title: Is it...?
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

[quote=“Arath, post:1, topic:38517”]Yesterday a noob came up to me in my server and said,
“Are you irlegal?”
I didn’t understand but quickly caught on to what he was saying, so i remembered when i played WoW private servers, the host was being sued by Blizzard.
So can we [or mopar] get sued for this?
[BTW]: I know it’s a stup1d topic, and there’s no “1nt3rn3t p0l1c3” but post your comments here.[/quote] No its not illegal unless you change everything on your private server to the same as runescape’s which is very unlikely!

Read full topic

item.title: Is it...?
item.dc:creator: @Viper99 Viper99
item.description:
@Viper99 wrote:

i wish i could make my own mopar/runescape program. but itd take years of studying scripting and i dont really have the time =/

Read full topic

item.title: Is it...?
item.dc:creator: @Imlostru Imlostru
item.description:
@Imlostru wrote:

its not illegal, since we started from scratch just like runescape did. If we had very very close or exact features of runescape. then it would be illegal

Read full topic
